trans-unit.target: 表示 Passport 身份验证的主体。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated and is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用，不再受支持。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Passport Network has been replaced by Windows Live ID.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Passport 网络已替换为通过 Windows Live id。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use Windows Live ID to authenticate users in a Web application, see [Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用 Windows Live ID 的 Web 应用中的用户进行身份验证的详细信息，请参阅[Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportPrincipal"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportIdentity"></xref> instance and an array of role names to which the user represented by that <xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportIdentity"></xref> belongs.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportPrincipal"></xref>类<xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportIdentity"></xref>实例，并向其表示的用户的角色名称的数组<xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportIdentity"></xref>所属。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated and is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用，不再受支持。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Passport Network has been replaced by Windows Live ID.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Passport 网络已替换为通过 Windows Live id。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use Windows Live ID to authenticate users in a Web application, see [Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用 Windows Live ID 的 Web 应用中的用户进行身份验证的详细信息，请参阅[Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346)。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> interface that represents the user.
An array of role names to which the user represented by the `identity` parameter belongs.
trans-unit.target: 向其表示的用户的角色名称的数组`identity`参数所属。
